welcome.title: Welcome to Bookmark

intro.2: the community where book lovers can register, rate, and discover books, share reviews, and connect with other readers.

welcome.track_desc: Add books to your personal library, mark the ones you've read, the ones you want to read, and keep track of your reading progress.
welcome.discover_desc: Explore reviews and ratings from other readers, share your opinions, and find your next favorite read.
welcome.lists_desc: Create custom lists, participate in reading challenges, and share your achievements with the community.
welcome.community_desc: Follow other readers, comment on their reviews, and be part of a community passionate about books.
